Headline: #9 Ashland  #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near 104th/ Vincennes
ShortDescription: Southbound #9 Ashland  #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Vincennes, 103rd, Charles, 104th, then resume their normal route on Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland  #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Vincennes, 103rd, Charles, 104th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near 104th/ Vincennes.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 104th/ Vincennes
ShortDescription: Westbound #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via  Vincennes, 103rd, Charles, 104th and Vincennes due to, street blockage near 104th/ Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via  Vincennes, 103rd, Charles, 104th and Vincennes due to, street blockage near 104th/ Vincennes.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
